data: I sit alone, with time sufficient before me to put down a record of the last year of my existence, and with the desire, if be possible, to gather together into one view, all the thoughts and feelings, and incidents and anecdotes, which have filled up one of the most painful periods of my existence.

The Desultory Man
Collection of Ancient and Modern British Novels and Romances. Vol. CXLVII.
G. P. R. (George Payne Rainsford) James
James, G. P. R. (George Payne Rainsford), 1801?-1860
